attributes.action: Not tax any Nhs staff or key workers during lockdown
attributes.additional_details: It isn't fair that key workers have to pay tax while keeping the country running, most people are having 80% of their wages paid with government help and yet Nhs and key workers are having to pay at least 20% of their wages while putting their lives on the line
attributes.background: I want all Nhs workers and key workers not to pay tax on their wages while the uk is in lockdown

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
